author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
CD Projekt wowed the internet after a Witcher 4 demo running on a base PS5 was showcased at an Unreal Engine 5 event. The've has since confirmed it's taking a "console-first" approach to the game, and though it may upset PC gamers, dev team CD Projekt RED has good reason. Cyberpunk 2077 was developed with high-end PCs in mind, and then scaled down for last-gen consoles PS4 and Xbox One. Cyberpunk 2077's launch on those platforms was a trainwreck, to say the least, and somethng CDPR wants to avoid for The Witcher 4. In other news, Borderlands 4's standard edition will not make the price jump to $80, instead launching at $70—likely in response to the absolute beating Gearbox's Randy Pitchford took online after his comments on a possible price hike for the game. And finally, Nintendo's Switch 2 is a hit, but a few Pokémon fans aren't having a great time after transferring—and losing—decades of Pokémon saved game progress.
title: There's a Good Reason Why The Witcher 4 Is Taking a "Console First" Approach - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: A team of Special Forces commandos wake up on an alien spacecraft with no memory of how they arrived. They horrifically discover they are being hunted by a merciless Alien race.
title: OSIRIS - Official Trailer (2025) Linda Hamilton, Max Martini, Brianna Hildebrand

author: IGN
description: The murderous doll who captivated pop culture in 2023 is back. And this time she’s not alone. The original creative team behind that phenomenon—led by horror titans James Wan for Atomic Monster, Jason Blum for Blumhouse and director Gerard Johnstone—reboot an all-new wild chapter in A.I. mayhem with M3GAN 2.0.
title: M3GAN 2.0 - Official Teaser (2025) Allison Williams, Violet McGraw, Ivanna Sakhno

author: IGN
description:
This summer, Dinosaurs rule the Earth. Check out the latest Jurassic World Rebirth teaser trailer for the upcoming movie starring Scarlett Johansson, Jonathan Bailey, Mahershala Ali, Rupert Friend, and Manuel Garcia-Rulfo. Jurassic World Rebirth opens in theaters on July 2, 2025.

Five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion, the planet’s ecology has proven largely inhospitable to dinosaurs. Those remaining exist in isolated equatorial environments with climates resembling the one in which they once thrived. The three most colossal creatures across land, sea and air within that tropical biosphere hold, in their DNA, the key to a drug that will bring miraculous life-saving benefits to humankind.

Scarlett Johansson plays skilled covert operations expert Zora Bennett, contracted to lead a skilled team on a top-secret mission to secure the genetic material. When Zora’s operation intersects with a civilian family whose boating expedition was capsized by marauding aquatic dinos,
title: Jurassic World Rebirth - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Scarlett Johansson, Mahershala Ali

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Dead by Daylight x Five Nights at Freddy's collaboration trailer for a peek at what to expect as Five Nights at Freddy's comes to the asymmetrical multiplayer horror game.

Dead by Daylight: Five Nights at Freddy’s features Springtrap, whose brilliant innovations are the perfect vessels for darkness.
title: Dead by Daylight x Five Nights at Freddy’s - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Live a better life tomorrow. Meet H.E.R.B.I.E. in this latest The Fantastic Four: First Steps teaser trailer for the upcoming MCU film. The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, they must defend Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus (Ralph Ineson) and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer (Julia Garner). And if Galactus’ plan to devour the entire planet and everyone
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official 'H.E.R.B.I.E.' Teaser Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at some Exclusive Battle System Gameplay from the upcoming remaster of a legendary action-adventure RPG Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army, developed by ATLUS. Fans will recognize the core battle system of Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army as it's based on another installment in the franchise, Devil Summoner 2: Raidou Kuzunoha vs. King Abaddon, but with a suite of refinements and enhancements for the modern era. Players can expect hectic real-time combat with a challenge that calls for quick strategic thinking to stay ahead of the curve. Enjoy over 6 minutes of battle system gameplay from Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army, launching on June 18 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#RaidouRemasteredTheMysteryOfTheSoullessArmy #Gaming #IGN
title: Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army - Exclusive Battle System Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Introducing TMNT's Leo as the newest character reveal in NickToons and the Dice of Destiny, the upcoming four-player local-co-op fantasy action-RPG that brings together characters from across the NickToons universe. Leo's packing seven unique abilities including Turtle Tornado and Katana Slash. NickToons and the Dice of Destiny is out this Fall for PC, PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3051490/Nicktoons__The_Dice_of_Destiny/

#NickToonAndTheDiceOfDestiny #Gaming #IGN
title: NickToons and the Dice of Destiny: Leo (TMNT) Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Bitmap Bureau, the developers behind the upcoming Terminator 2D: No Fate, joined us to discuss how they're planning on turning 1990s movie gold into a video game success worthy of the film's classic status.

So, what does a T2 game look like, and why was a retro run and gun-style arcade shooter chosen? In our interview, featuring exclusive Terminator 2D gameplay, Bitmap explains what they're doing to craft the perfect Terminator game.

#IGN #Terminator
title: Why a Terminator 2 Retro Game in 2025 NEEDED To Be Made

author: IGN
description:
Only one man has the particular set of skills... to lead Police Squad and save the world! Lt. Frank Drebin Jr. (Liam Neeson) follows in his father's footsteps in The Naked Gun. Check out the new trailer for The Naked Gun, an upcoming comedy movie starring Liam Neeson, Pamela Anderson, Paul Walter Hauser, CCH Pounder, Kevin Durand, Cody Rhodes, Liza Koshy, Eddie Yu, with Danny Huston.

The Naked Gun is produced by Seth MacFarlane, p.g.a., Erica Huggins, p.g.a. Executive producers are Daniel M. Stillman, Akiva Schaffer, Pete Chiappetta, Anthony Tittanegro, and Andrew Lary. It is written by Dan Gregor & Doug Mand & Akiva Schaffer.

The Naked Gun, directed by Akiva Schaffer, opens in theaters on August 1, 2025.

#IGN #TheNakedGun #Movies
title: The Naked Gun - Official Trailer (2025) Liam Neeson, Pamela Anderson
